where-and-when-uwh

Looking to play Underwater Hockey?

Click on your province and get in the pool!

British Columbia

Port Coquitlam – Rumblefish UWH
Webpage: http://www.rumblefishclub.com/
Contact: rob@sharezen.com 
Pool Times:

– Tuesday from 9:00 to 10:10pm @ the Hyde Creek Rec Centre

– Thursday from 9:00 – 10:30 pm @ CG Brown Burnaby

– Sunday from 10:00am – 12:45 pm @ City Centre Aquatic Complex – Coquitlam

Prince George
Webpage: N/A
Contact: rader@unbc.ca 
Pool Times:
– Wednesday from 9:00 – 10:00 pm @ the Prince George Aquatic Centre
– Sunday from 7:00 – 8:00 pm @ the Prince George Aquatic Centre

Vancouver
Webpage: UBC UWH Facebook Page
Contact: mel_j@telus.net 
Pool Times:
– Tuesday 7:30 to 9:00pm (times can vary, email contact to confirm current schedule) @ the UBC Aquatic Centre
– Sunday from 9:00 am to 10:30am @ the UBC Aquatic Centre

Victoria
Webpage: http://www.underwaterhockeyvictoria.ca/ 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/groups/uwhockey.victoria/ 
Contact: hellopatti@shaw.ca
Pool Times:
– Friday from 7:30 – 8:30 pm @ the Saanich Commonwealth Place

Alberta

Edmonton
Webpage: https://edmuwh.club/
Contact: info@edmuwh.club
Pool Times:
– Monday from 7:30 – 8:30 pm @ Peter Hemingway 
– Wednesday from 8:00 – 9:30 pm @ Kinsmen Sports Center

Calgary
Webpage: http://www.calgaryunderwater.ca
Contact: cuhc@live.ca or myrnakruger@shaw.ca
Pool Times:
– Tuesday from 7:30 – 9:30 pm @ the Repsol Sports Centre
– Thursday from 7:30 – 9:30 pm @ the Repsol Sports Centre
– Sunday from 5:30 – 7:30 pm @ the Repsol Sports Centre (beginners/kids)

Central Alberta (Red Deer & Lacombe) 
Webpage: http://www.cauwhc.net
Contact: cauwhc@gmail.com
Pool Times:
– Sundays from 1:00 PM – 2:30 pm – alternates between Roland Michener Recreation Centre (Red Deer) & Canadian University College Physical Education Center (Lacombe) on a monthly basis.

Saskatchewan

Saskatoon
Webpage: www.facebook.com/SSUWH
Contact: sealsuwh@gmail.com
Pool Times:
– Monday from 8:00 – 9:00 pm @ the YMCA 
– Thursday from 8:00 – 9:00 pm @ the YMCA 
If you’re lost, call (306) 954-4639 and/or look for Joanne!

Manitoba

There are currently no registered UWH clubs here. If you have one, please email us so we can update our records!

Toronto
Webpage: http://torontouwh.com/

Pool Times:
– Monday from 9pm-10 pm @ the Trinity Bellwoods Recreation Centre Pool – 155 Crawford St
– Wednesday schedules varies, see Facebook for details or contact club for current pool times.

Gatineau-Ottawa
Webpage: www.uwh.ca

Pool Times:
– Visit http://www.go-hsa.ca/index.php/en/calendar for the latest schedule

Pool Times:
– Wednesday from 10:00 – 11:00 pm @ the University of Guelph Athletics Centre 
– Thursday from 10:00 – 11:00 pm @ the University of Guelph Athletics Centre 
*Does not run during summer months

Cambridge
Webpage: https://www.facebook.com/groups/873450819436795/

– Mondays from 8:10 to 9:40pm @ Cambridge YMCA
